ERROR_SERVICE_UNAVAILABLE.description: It is possible that the server pressure is high, please try again later, if it continues to appear please contact customer service

ERROR_RATE_LIMIT.description: Service packages request rate limit. When this error occurs, you have exceeded the rate limit

ERROR_BAD_REQUEST.description: Request error, if it persists please contact customer service

ERROR_TASKID_INVALID.errorDescription: Task ID does not exist or is invalid.
ERROR_TASKID_INVALID.description: Wrong ID was requested, or the ID no longer exists

ERROR_TASK_TIMEOUT.description: If the recognition is still not successful in 120 seconds, a timeout error will be reported

ERROR_SETTLEMENT_FAILED.description: Please check your balance or contact customer service

ERROR_KEY_DENIED_ACCESS.description: Please check if your clientKey key is correct, get it in the personal center

ERROR_ZERO_BALANCE.description: The account balance is not enough to offset the consumption, please top up

ERROR_TASK_NOT_SUPPORTED.description: Captcha type is incorrect or not yet supported

ERROR_UNKNOWN_QUESTION.description: Normally the task cannot be processed

ERROR_PROXY_BANNED.errorDescription: Proxy IP banned by target service.
ERROR_PROXY_BANNED.description: Proxy IP banned by target service

ERROR_INVALID_IMAGE.errorDescription: Image size does not meet the requirements.

ERROR_PARSE_IMAGE_FAIL.description: Please check if the image BASE64 encoding is correct

ERROR_IP_BANNED.errorDescription: Your IP has been blocked for 10 minutes.
ERROR_IP_BANNED.description: If a large number of errors (up to 1000 times) occur within a short period of time (within 1 minute), the system will automatically blocked for 30 minutes. Please check your error information and try again

ERROR_KEY_TEMP_BLOCKED.errorDescription: Due to too many error requests have been blocked.
ERROR_KEY_TEMP_BLOCKED.description: Due to too many errors, requests have been blocked and will be automatically unblocked in 5 minutes, please try again later.
